task.title: Compare dates
task.shortdesc: Steps that describe how you can use the calendar to run date comparisons between ranked reports.

context.p: You cannot compare dates between trended reports.
context.note: If you want to perform a date comparison on key metrics in a dashboard, you can pull the data into Report Builder using two separate requests. You then use custom formulas in Excel to analyze the difference between the two.
context.p: To compare dates between ranked reports in marketing reports & analytics:

step.cmd: Select the dates you want to use.
